Avery Laird

Musician

Scroll Down

Music unites, moves, and inspires. My goal is to create a shared experience with the audience, and give everyone what they need in that moment. Depending on the venue, crowd, and desired experience, my style can vary from acoustic/folky tunes to indie rock/jangle pop.

Vancouver, Canada averylairdmusic.com/
